description: UOK is a wellness app that helps you track your daily check-ins, connect with emergency contacts through bonding codes, and share memories with your community.
shortDescription: Daily wellness check-ins and emergency contact management

appStore.subtitle: Daily wellness and emergency contact management
appStore.description:
UOK helps you maintain your wellness by:

✓ Daily mood check-ins with customizable time slots (morning, afternoon, evening)
✓ Emergency contact bonding through secure bond codes
✓ Share memories with the community or specific contacts
✓ Privacy controls - share with everyone, bonded contacts, or specific users
✓ Connect with partners and discover wellness resources

Take care of yourself and let your loved ones know you're okay.
